remarks: Value of general operation (addition or multiplication) on positive reals.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Mar-1996.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
genp.1 $e |- F = ( w e. P. , v e. P. |-> { x | E. y e. w E. z e. v x = ( y G z ) } ) $.
genp.2 $e |- ( ( y e. Q. /\ z e. Q. ) -> ( y G z ) e. Q. ) $.
genpv $p |- ( ( A e. P. /\ B e. P. ) -> ( A F B ) = { f | E. g e. A E. h e. B f = ( g G h ) } ) $.
$d A f g h x y z $.
$d B f g h x y z $.
$d F f g $.
$d G f g h v w x y z $.
